gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 115, Magic 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Magic, 115-106. Tyler Herro led the way for the Heat with 28 points, eight rebounds and seven assists, while Bam Adebayo added 18 points and seven rebounds in the victory. Paolo Banchero tallied 10 points, eight rebounds and eight assists for the Magic in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 16-12 on the season, while the Magic fall to 16-10.
